Coon_Rapids.Anoka High School:
Anoka High School is a four-year public high school located in Anoka, Minnesota, US on 3939 7th Avenue N.


== School overview ==
Anoka High School is part of Anoka-Hennepin School District 11 and is one of five regular high schools in the district. The history of Anoka High School can be traced back to 1880 and the establishment of the city of Anoka, making it one of the oldest high schools in Minnesota. The school districts of Anoka and surrounding communities were consolidated into the Anoka-Hennepin School District in 1952.
